name: Layered Mint Brownies
steps: Cream together butter, sugar and cocoa. Beat eggs in 1 at a time. Add vanilla. Combine dry ingredients and fold into wet ingredients. Put in a greased 9 x 13 pan at 350 for 20-25 min.
Frosting: Cream butter and sugar. Add milk until smooth consistency. Beat in flavor and color. Spread on cooled brownies and chill for 1 hour.

Chocolate topping: Pour chips into a microwavable bowl, add butter. Microwave for 1.10 min or until chocolate melts. Stir until smooth. Pour over brownies and smooth with a knife. Refrigerate for 45 min. Bring brownies to room temperature before cutting and serving.
